overall_goal: Clean and sort millet and wheat kernels to remove dirt and impurities before storing them in sacks.

clips.subgoal: Inspect, clean, and sort millet using a grain cleaner and sack.

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Use the grain cleaner to clean millet multiple times.
Gather cleaned millet back into the sack.
Repeat cleaning and sorting millet process.

clips.subgoal: Inspect, clean, and sort wheat kernels using a sieve and sack.

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Remove dirt from wheat kernels in multiple cleaning cycles.
Winnow wheat kernels to separate lighter dirt and debris.
Transfer cleaned wheat kernels back into the sack.

clips.subgoal: Interact with a person (Man Y) while preparing to resume cleaning and sorting.

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Enter the house and talk to Man Y.
Continue talking and marking hand gestures to Man Y.

clips.subgoal: Continue cleaning and sorting wheat kernels after interaction.

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Sweep, clean, and inspect wheat kernels.
Remove dirt and inspect the grains repeatedly.
Pour and transfer cleaned grains again.

clips.subgoal: Engage in conversation with Man Y while continuing to clean wheat kernels.

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Talk to Man Y while cleaning and spreading wheat kernels.
Continue cleaning and sorting wheat kernels, occasionally focusing on the conversation.
